original_text: The Pharisees began to argue with him. They said, ‘You are saying things about yourself. But there is nobody else to agree that these things are true.’
korean_text: 바리새인들이 이르되 네가 너를 위하여 증언하니 네 증언은 참되지 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees began to argue with him.
You are saying things about yourself.
to agree that these things are true.
